main.name: Dominique Thomas
main.description: Im focused in Python developement hoping to create better software and systems for the companies that contribute useful technologies for the world.
main.bio:
I watch tons of movies, I play action & adventure videogames, and I love to experience new adventures with my girlfriend. I'm also currently saving to invest in my real-estate deal. 
From basic puzzles to advanced math, I have always had an immense fascination to solve problems. When I was introduced to computer science in high school, it seemed natural, and I loved it! Today I feel an obligation to imaginatively contribute technology that world can use.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.
